item.title: Karianne add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "When you interrupt, you've stopped listening. People need to be heard." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Karianne add a quote by Elizabeth Glaser
item.description:
"It is unthinkable and grotesque that we make the same mistake over and over again. There should be an uproar of children shouting, "What about me?" But they often can't speak and so their plight goes unnoticed...
" -- Elizabeth Glaser

item.title: Karianne add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "I swore never to be silent whenever and wherever human beings endure suffering and humiliation. We must always take sides." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Karianne add a quote by Melissa Fay Greene
item.description:
"Who was going to raise 12 million children? That was what I suddenly wanted to know....Who was teaching 12 million children how to swim.....Who will tell 12 million bedtime stories....Who will wake in the night in response to 12 million nightmares....Well, as it turns out, no one. Or very few. There aren't enough adults to go around."
There is No Me Without You" -- Melissa Fay Greene

item.title: Karianne add a quote by Mother Teresa of Calcutta
item.description: "There should be less talk; a preaching point is not a meeting point. What do you do then? Take a broom and clean someone's house. That says enough." -- Mother Teresa of Calcutta

item.title: Karianne add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "The most terrible poverty is loneliness, and the feeling of being unloved." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Karianne add a quote by Sinclair Lewis
item.description: "We'd get sick on too many cookies, but ever so much sicker on no cookies at all." -- Sinclair Lewis
